9 // default constructor (ORB detection and ORB descriptor)
10 FeatureDetector::FeatureDetector(ros::NodeHandle node): node_(node)
11 {
12  ROS_WARN("No detection method or descriptor type specified. Using ORB detection and ORB descriptor by default.");
13 
14  detectionMethod_ = ORB;
15  descriptorType_ = ORB;
16 
17  detectPtr_ = &FeatureDetector::detectFeatures_ORB;
18  computeDescriptorPtr_ = &FeatureDetector::computeDescriptor_ORB;
19 
20  FeatureDetector::getParams(detectionMethod_);
21 }
22 
23 // constructor with arguments
24 FeatureDetector::FeatureDetector(ros::NodeHandle node, std::string detectionMethod, std::string descriptorType): node_(node)
25 {
26  if((detectionMethod == FAST || detectionMethod == BRISK || detectionMethod == ORB || detectionMethod == SHI_TOMASI) && (descriptorType == BRISK || descriptorType == BRIEF || descriptorType == ORB))
27  {
28  detectionMethod_ = detectionMethod;
29  descriptorType_ = descriptorType;
30 
31  if(detectionMethod == FAST)
32  detectPtr_ = &FeatureDetector::detectFeatures_FAST;
33  else if(detectionMethod == BRISK)
34  detectPtr_ = &FeatureDetector::detectFeatures_BRISK;
35  else if(detectionMethod == ORB)
36  detectPtr_ = &FeatureDetector::detectFeatures_ORB;
37  else if(detectionMethod == SHI_TOMASI)
38  detectPtr_ = &FeatureDetector::detectFeatures_ShiTomasi;
39 
40  if(descriptorType_ == BRISK)
41  computeDescriptorPtr_ = &FeatureDetector::computeDescriptor_BRISK;
42  else if(descriptorType_ == BRIEF)
43  computeDescriptorPtr_ = &FeatureDetector::computeDescriptor_BRIEF;
44  else if(descriptorType_ == ORB)
45  computeDescriptorPtr_ = &FeatureDetector::computeDescriptor_ORB;
46  }
47  else
48  {
49  ROS_WARN("Invalid detection method or descriptor type. Using ORB detection and ORB descriptor by default.");
50 
51  detectionMethod_ = ORB;
52  descriptorType_ = ORB;
53  detectPtr_ = &FeatureDetector::detectFeatures_ORB;
54  computeDescriptorPtr_ = &FeatureDetector::computeDescriptor_ORB;
55  }
56 
57  FeatureDetector::getParams(detectionMethod_);
58 }

61 FeatureDetector::~FeatureDetector()
62 {
63 
64 }
65 
66 // detect features
67 std::vector<Feature> FeatureDetector::detectFeatures(cv::Mat image, int seqNo, int camNo)
68 {
69  std::vector<cv::Mat> buckets;
70  std::vector<cv::Point2f> offsets;
71  getBuckets(image, buckets, offsets);
72 
73  std::vector<Feature> features;
74 
75  for(int i=0; i<buckets.size(); i++)
76  {
77  // detect keypoints in the bucket
78  std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> kpts_bucket = ((FeatureDetector*)this->*detectPtr_)(buckets[i]);
79  cv::Mat ds = ((FeatureDetector*)this->*computeDescriptorPtr_)(buckets[i], kpts_bucket);
80 
81  // map those keypoints to the full image
82  std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> kpts;
83  for(int j=0; j<kpts_bucket.size(); j++)
84  {
85  cv::KeyPoint kp(kpts_bucket[j]);
86  kp.pt = kpts_bucket[j].pt + offsets[i];
87  kpts.push_back(kp);
88  }
89 
90  // build bucket feature vector
91  std::vector<Feature> fs = descriptors2Features(kpts, ds, seqNo, camNo);
92 
93  // append to full image feature vector
94  features.insert(features.end(), fs.begin(), fs.end());
95  }
96 
97  return features;
98 }
99 
100 // highlight features in an image
101 cv::Mat FeatureDetector::highlightFeatures(cv::Mat image, std::vector<Feature> features)
102 {
103  cv::Mat imageFeatures;
104  cv::cvtColor(image, imageFeatures, CV_GRAY2BGR);
105 
106  for(int i=0; i<features.size(); i++)
107  {
108  circle(imageFeatures, features[i].getKeypoint().pt, 3, cv::Scalar(0, 255, 0), 2);
109  }
110  return imageFeatures;
111 }
112 
113 void FeatureDetector::getBuckets(cv::Mat image, std::vector<cv::Mat> &buckets, std::vector<cv::Point2f> &offsets)
114 {
115  int bucketWidth = round((double)image.cols / bucketing_numberHorizontal_);
116  int bucketHeight = round((double)image.rows / bucketing_numberVertical_);
117 
118  int offset_v = 0;
119  double width, height;
120  for(int i=0; i<bucketing_numberVertical_; i++)
121  {
122  int offset_h = 0;
123  if(i == bucketing_numberVertical_ - 1)
124  {
125  height = image.rows - i*bucketHeight;
126  }
127  else
128  {
129  height = bucketHeight;
130  }
131  for(int j=0; j<bucketing_numberHorizontal_; j++)
132  {
133  if(j == bucketing_numberHorizontal_ - 1)
134  {
135  width = image.cols - j*bucketWidth;
136  }
137  else
138  {
139  width = bucketWidth;
140  }
141 
142  cv::Mat b = image(cv::Rect(offset_h, offset_v, width, height));
143  buckets.push_back(b);
144 
145  cv::Point2f o(offset_h, offset_v);
146  offsets.push_back(o);
147 
148  offset_h += bucketWidth;
149  }
150  offset_v += bucketHeight;
151  }
152 }
153 
154 std::vector<Feature> FeatureDetector::descriptors2Features(std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> keypoints, cv::Mat descriptors, int seqNo, int camNo)
155 {
156  std::vector<Feature> features;
157  for(int i=0; i<keypoints.size(); i++)
158  {
159  cv::Mat d = descriptors(cv::Rect(0, i, descriptors.cols, 1));
160  Feature f(keypoints[i], d, seqNo, camNo);
161  features.push_back(f);
162  }
163  return features;
164 }
165 
166 // get feature detection parameters
167 void FeatureDetector::getParams(std::string detectionMethod)
168 {
169  if(detectionMethod == FAST)
170  {
171  node_.param<int>("FAST_threshold", FAST_threshold_, 50);
172  node_.param<bool>("FAST_nonMaxSup", FAST_nonMaxSup_, true);
173  }
174  else if(detectionMethod == BRISK)
175  {
176  node_.param<int>("BRISK_threshold", BRISK_threshold_, 10);
177  node_.param<int>("BRISK_octaves", BRISK_octaves_, 4);
178  node_.param<double>("BRISK_patternScale", BRISK_patternScale_, 0.1);
179  }
180  else if(detectionMethod == ORB)
181  {
182  node_.param<int>("ORB_maxFeatures", ORB_maxFeatures_, 500);
183  node_.param<double>("ORB_scale", ORB_scale_, 1.2);
184  node_.param<int>("ORB_nLevels", ORB_nLevels_, 8);
185  node_.param<int>("ORB_edgeThreshold", ORB_edgeThreshold_, 31);
186  node_.param<int>("ORB_firstLevel", ORB_firstLevel_, 0);
187  node_.param<int>("ORB_wtak", ORB_wtak_, 2);
188  node_.param<int>("ORB_scoreType", ORB_scoreType_, cv::ORB::HARRIS_SCORE);
189  node_.param<int>("ORB_patchSize", ORB_patchSize_, 31);
190  }
191  else if(detectionMethod == SHI_TOMASI)
192  {
193  node_.param<int>("ShiTomasi_maxFeatures", ShiTomasi_maxFeatures_, 30);
194  node_.param<double>("ShiTomasi_qualityLevel", ShiTomasi_qualityLevel_, 0.01);
195  node_.param<double>("ShiTomasi_minDistance", ShiTomasi_minDistance_, 10);
196  node_.param<int>("ShiTomasi_blockSize", ShiTomasi_blockSize_, 3);
197  }
198 
199  node_.param<int>("bucketing_numberHorizontal", bucketing_numberHorizontal_, 1);
200  node_.param<int>("bucketing_numberVertical", bucketing_numberVertical_, 2);
201 }
202 
203 // FAST feature detection
204 std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> FeatureDetector::detectFeatures_FAST(cv::Mat image)
205 {
206  std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> keypoints;
207  cv::FastFeatureDetector detector(FAST_threshold_, FAST_nonMaxSup_);
208  detector.detect(image, keypoints);
209  return keypoints;
210 }
211 
212 // BRISK feature detection
213 std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> FeatureDetector::detectFeatures_BRISK(cv::Mat image)
214 {
215  std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> keypoints;
216  cv::BRISK detector(BRISK_threshold_, BRISK_octaves_, BRISK_patternScale_);
217  detector.detect(image, keypoints);
218  return keypoints;
219 }
220 
221 // ORB feature detection
222 std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> FeatureDetector::detectFeatures_ORB(cv::Mat image)
223 {
224  std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> keypoints;
225  cv::OrbFeatureDetector detector(ORB_maxFeatures_, ORB_scale_, ORB_nLevels_, ORB_edgeThreshold_, ORB_firstLevel_, ORB_wtak_, ORB_scoreType_, ORB_patchSize_);
226  detector.detect(image, keypoints);
227  return keypoints;
228 }
229 
230 std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> FeatureDetector::detectFeatures_ShiTomasi(cv::Mat image)
231 {
232  std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> keypoints;
233  cv::GoodFeaturesToTrackDetector detector(ShiTomasi_maxFeatures_, ShiTomasi_qualityLevel_, ShiTomasi_minDistance_, ShiTomasi_blockSize_);
234  detector.detect(image, keypoints);
235  return keypoints;
236 }

238 // BRISK descriptor extraction
239 cv::Mat FeatureDetector::computeDescriptor_BRISK(cv::Mat image, std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> &keypoints)
240 {
241  cv::Mat descriptors;
242  cv::Ptr<cv::DescriptorExtractor> extractor = cv::DescriptorExtractor::create(BRISK);
243  extractor->compute(image, keypoints, descriptors);
244  return descriptors;
245 }
246 
247 // BRIEF descriptor extraction
248 cv::Mat FeatureDetector::computeDescriptor_BRIEF(cv::Mat image, std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> &keypoints)
249 {
250  cv::Mat descriptors;
251  cv::Ptr<cv::DescriptorExtractor> extractor = cv::DescriptorExtractor::create(BRIEF);
252  extractor->compute(image, keypoints, descriptors);
253  return descriptors;
254 }

256 // ORB descriptor extraction
257 cv::Mat FeatureDetector::computeDescriptor_ORB(cv::Mat image, std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> &keypoints)
258 {
259  cv::Mat descriptors;
260  cv::Ptr<cv::DescriptorExtractor> extractor = cv::DescriptorExtractor::create(ORB);
261  extractor->compute(image, keypoints, descriptors);
262  return descriptors;
